name: abasic-web
description: Web front-end for the ABASIC interpreter.

scripts.copy-to-dist: rimraf dist && npx copyfiles index.html img/*.* ts/*.js pkg/*.js pkg/*.wasm dist && npx copyfiles -u 1 ../programs/*.bas dist
scripts.publish: npm run wasm && tsc && npm run copy-to-dist && gh-pages -d dist
